hero.title: Meet the Filipino mother - daughter duo smashing stereotypes to resolve conflicts
hero.description: As Asean prepares to launch a regional framework on promoting women’s role in peacebuilding, ‘superwoman’ Connie Dumato and her daughter Princess provide a template for female-led conflict resolution.

primary.title: Philippines’ inflation soars to 14-year high, fueling expectations of more rate hikes
primary.description: Philippines' annual inflation data soared to 8.0%, marking the country's fastest inflation in 14-year high since November 2008.

secondary.title: Inflation surges to 8.0% in November
secondary.description: Prices of consumer goods in the Philippines continued to grow faster than targeted in November to hit the highest in 14 years, government data released Tuesday showed.

secondary.title: Philippines: Inflation hits 14 year high as food inflation spikes
secondary.description: Philippine inflation hits its highest level since 2008

secondary.title: Philippines inflation at 14-year high, backs case for 50 bps rate hike
secondary.description: Philippine annual inflation surged to a 14-year high in November driven mainly by higher food prices, the statistics agency said on Tuesday, with the pickup in prices seen supporting the case for a half-percentage point interest rate hike this month.

carousel.title: In the Philippines, a deadly storm holds lessons on climate resilience
carousel.description: In the Philippines, one village’s struggle to rebuild in the aftermath of Tropical Storm Nalgae highlights the limits of climate resilience strategies. Does running from high-risk areas always make a community safer?

carousel.title: Philippines sees a pandemic boom in child sex abuse
carousel.description: Lockdowns and school closures left children at home with poor parents, desperate to make money.

carousel.title: Hidilyn bags 3 golds in World Championships
carousel.description: Hidilyn Diaz-Naranjo won three gold medals to rule the 55-kilogram category of the World Championships of the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) in Bogota, Colombia.

carousel.title: How a female founder convinced tiny stores to digitalize mid-pandemic
carousel.description: Aiko Reyes, COO and co-founder of Peddlr, on her mission to bring the Philippines' 20 million micro and small businesses online.
